Translations.Text: S yisem n Oebbi, Aenin Ipeunun
Ccekoan i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Aenin Ipeunun
Agellid n wass iqeiiiyen
D Kecc ay naabed, d Kecc ay nepper d Ama²iwen
Awi ya$ d ubrid iweqmen
Abrid n wid i T$atev; ur n wid i K isserfayen, ne$ n im$eooqen
Alm
Appan Tezmamt, ur degs ccekk, d nnhaya i wid ipeezziben
wid iumnen s tbavnit, ipeallan, ipseddiqen seg wayen iten N$at
wid iumnen s wayen i k d irsen, akked wayen id irsen, uqbel ik, u, $ef laxeot, nitni, pputebbten
Widak, di nnhaya n Mass nnsen, widak, d isaadiyen
Wid ijehlen, s tidep, iauva fellasen ma tnubav ten, ne$ ur ten tnubav. Ur ppamnen
Isle$ Oebbi ulawen nnsen, akked imeeeu$en nnsen. Irs le$yao $ef allen nnsen. Fellasen aaaqeb abarar
Ger yimdanen, llan wid iqqaoen: "numen s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru”; nitni, ur llin d lmumnin
La xedaen Oebbi akked wid iumnen. Ur xedaen siwa iman nnsen, ur faqen
Aian deg ulawen nnsen; Irna yasen Oebbi aian. Fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean, ilmend n wayen skiddiben
Ma nnan asen: "ur ssefsadet di tmurt"! A d inin: "nekwni d wid, kan, ipleqqimen
Day macci d nitni, s tidep, ay d ifessaden, maca ur faqen
Ma nnan asen: "amnet, akken umnen medden"! A d inin: "day a namen, akken umnen ije$lufen"? Day macci d nitni, s tidep, ay d ije$lufen, maca ur eoin
Ma mmugren d wid iumnen, ad inin: "numen". Mara yilin weeeedsen, ar ccwaien nnsen, ad inin: "nekwni yidwen! Nekwni la nettihi kan
Oebbi ad Ittihi fellasen. Isnerna yasen lbwe$v nnsen; ddebdeben
Widak, d wid iu$en ttelfan s nnhaya; ur d issasay ssuq nnsen, ur pwanhan
Tevoa yidsen am win issa$en times. Mi tnewweo ayen i s d izzin, Oebbi Iddem tafat nnsen, Iooa ten di tillas, ur pwalin
Aaegen, gugmen, dre$len; ihi, nitni ur d ppu$alen s abrid
Ne$ am usigna igenni, degs tillas, tirmegt, leboaq. Pparran ivudan nnsen deg imeeeu$en nnsen, mgal ssiaqat; ad nnestaoen si tmeppant. Oebbi Izzi i ijehliyen
Qoib i sen iewi leboaq, ieoi. Yal tikelt ideg i sen icaal, ad ddun syis. Mi sen ixsi, ad eebsen. Ma ihwa yaS i Oebbi, ad asen Ikkes timesliwt akked yieoi nnsen. Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer i yal cci
A yimdanen! Aabdet Mass nnwen ikwen Ixelqen, kunwi, akked wid i kwen id izwaren, amar a peezzbem
i wen Irran tamurt d usu, igenni d lebni; id Isse$li d aman seg igenni, Issuffe$ ed yissen ppemoa, d ooeeq i kunwi. Ihi, ur pparrat tanudda i Oebbi, u kunwi teeoam
Ma tellam di ccekk, $ef wayen id Nessers ar umdan nne£, awit ed tasuoep i p icban. Neccdet ed inagan nnwen, war Oebbi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ma ur tessawvem, u, war ccekk, ur tessawavem, eezzbet i tmes isseo$an imdanen, id$a$en, ippuheggan i ijehliyen

Becceo wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, ar i nitni, leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Yal tikelt ara ppuoeeqen, si ppemoa nnsen, ad inin: "d aya is neppuoeeq, uqbel". Ippunefk asen i ten icban. Din, jjwao nnsen d ayen iufan. Degsen ad wekkoen

Ih, ur Ikukra ara Oebbi, a d Ifk amedya n tizip, ne$ ip i$elben. Wid iumnen eoan neppa d tidep, s$uo Mass nnsen. Wanag wid ijehlen qqaoen: "acu Ib$a Oebbi s umedya agi"? Yis, Itellif aias; yis, Inehhu aias. Ur Itellif yis, siwa iballa$en
wid ipoueun lemaahda n Oebbi, deffir lmitaq iS, issemfaoaqen ayen id Iumeo Oebbi ad imlil, issefsaden di tmurt. Widak d imexsuoen
Amek ara tnekoem Oebbi? Tellam temmuten, Issader kwen id. Sinna, a kwen Ine$, sinna, a kwen id Issider, sinna, $uoeS a ppu$alem
D Neppa i wen Ixelqen ayen akw illan di tmurt; sinna, Izzi ar igenni, Iwqem it d ua igenwan. Neppa, Issen yal cci

Mi Inna Mass ik, i lmalayek: "Nek ad Rre$ aneuuaf di tmurt". Nnant aS: "day a Pperrev, degs, win ara isfesden degs, ara izzizlen idamen? Wanag, nekwenti nesbuccua K s ccekoan, u Neooequ yaK". Inna: "Nek, eoi$ ayen ur teeoimt
Isseefev akw ismawen i Adem. Sinna, Issken iten i lmalayek, Inna: "efkemt iyI d ismawen n wigi, ma kunemti d sut tidep
Nnant: "gedha s yisseK! Ur nessin, siwa i a$ Teslemdev. Kecc, s tidep, d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Inna: "a Adem, efk asent ismawen nnsen". Mi sent imla ismawen nnsen, Inna: "day ur a kwent Nni$ ara: Nek Ssne$ tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan, u eoi$ ayen d teqqaoem, akked wayen teppeffrem
Mi Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem"! Knant, siwa Iblis. Iugi, u isme$weo iman is. Illa seg ijehliyen
Nenna: "a Adem, ezde$ kecc akked tmeiiut ik, di Loennet, eccet segs, s tawant, ayen i wen ihwan. Ur ppaeet ar ttejoa yagi, mulac a ppilim d imednas
Ikellex iten Cciian fellas. Issuffe$ iten id seg wanda llan. Nenna: "uuubbet, d icenga bbwaygarawen. I kunwi, di tmurt, i$imi akked zzhu, siwa tallit
Adem iiief awalen n Mass is. Issuref as. Neppa, s tidep, Issuruf, Ipeunu
Nenna: "uuubbet segs, akken ma tellam. War ccekk, a kwen id tas nnhaya s$uoI". Wid iddan d nnhaya, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Wid ijehlen u skaddben issekniyen nne£, widak d at tmes, degs ad wekkoen
A yAt Isoail! Mmektit ed l$it iW, is ikwen Oeeqe$. Eiifet di lemaahda W, ad Iife$ di lemaahda nnwen. D nek iwumi ara teezzbem
Amnet s wayen id Sserse$, itebbten ayen illan $uowen. Ur ppilit d imezwura ara t iagwin. Ur ppa$et, s issekniyen iW, ayen oxisen. D nek iwumi ara teezzbem
Ur slusut, i tidep, tikerkas. Ur teffret tidep, u kunwi teeoam
eeallet, zekkit, iiinzet akked wid iiiinizen
Day a ppamoem ise$ i medden, a ppeppum iman nnwen? U kunwi teqqaoem Tazmamt. Day ur tefhimem ara
Ssutret lemaawna n uubeo akked teallit. Ih, dayen iwaaoen, siwa i imeeluven
wid ieuan ar ad mlilen akked Mass nnsen, u $uoeS, nitni, war ccekk, ad u$alen
A yAt Isoail! Mmektit ed l$it iW, is ikwen Oeeqe$. Nek, Smenyafe$ kwen i imavalen
Eezzbet i wass ideg ur ippuoazi yiwen deg umkan n wayev, s wacemma. Ur tepwaqbal ccafuaa segs, ur tepwaiiaf, segs, le$oama, ur ten ppaawanen
Mi kwen Nsellek seg ugdud n Feraun, saaddayen fellawen aaaqeb adiran. Zellun arrac nnwen, ssidiren tilawin nnwen. Ayagi d taluft tabarart, s$uo Mass nnwen
Mi, yiswen, Nessemfaoeq ill, Nsellek ikwen, Ne$meq agdud n Feraun, kunwi la tepwalim
Mi Nga lemaahda i Musa, kueet wavan; sinna, deffir es, teddam d uaajmi. Kunwi d imednas
Sinna, deffir waya, Nsemmee awen, amar a ppesnemmrem
Mi Nefka, i Musa, Tazmamt akked ufraz, amar a ppeppwanhum

Mi inna Musa i ugdud is: "a yagdud iw! Kunwi, s tidep, tdensem iman nnwen, mi teddam d uaajmi. Ssutret ssmae i Uxellaq nnwen; mmin$et, ppif i kunwi ar Uxellaq nnwen. Issuref awen. Neppa, s tidep, Issuruf, Ipeunu
Mi tennam: "a Musa! Ur neppamen yisek, d awez$i, alamma nwala Oebbi, ainani". Tewwet ikwen id ssiaqa, kunwi tepwalim
Sinna, Nerra kwen id, deffir tmeppant nnwen, amar a ppesnemmrem
S usigna, Nerra yawen tili. Nessers awen d lmenna, ifeoouoen: "eccet si teidanin is ikwen N$at". Ur a£ dnisen, maca densen iman nnsen
Mi Nenna: "kecmet tamdint agi, eccet degs, s tawant, ayen i wen ihwan; kecmet si tebburt, s lekni; init: nendem. Ad awen Nsemmee tuccva nnwen, a Nernu i iaaoviyen
Wid idensen bedlen awal, ur d win i sen nnan. Nessers ed, i wid idensen, tawa$it seg igenni, ilmend n tucmitin nnsen
Mi issuter Musa aman i ugdud is, Nenna: "ewwet aeou, s uakkwaz ik". Feggvent ed, segs, mrawsnat tliwa. Yal wa ieoa anda ara issew. "Eccet, esswet, si ooeeq n Oebbi. Ur ssefsadet di tmurt am imjaeen

Mi tennam: "a Musa! Ur nesteqnaa bippa s yiwen n lqut. Nuj a$ Mass ik, ad a$ d Issuffe$ ayen d teggar tmurt: tizzegzewt is, axyao is, ticcert is, laads is, lebuel is". Inna: "teb$am a pbedlem ayen ilhan s wayen ixuuen? Uuubbet ar Maueo, a n tafem, war ccekk, ayen tessutrem". I$li d fellasen ddell akked eeelt. Sebbeben d urrif n Oebbi. Ayagi, acku llan ugin issekniyen n Oebbi, neqqen lambiyya, war ssebba. Ayagi, imi auuan, u zgaren tilas
Ih, wid iumnen, udayen, imasieiyen, iuabiyen, kra iumnen s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, ad saun arraz ar Mass nnsen, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Mi Nga laaqed yidwen, Nessuli adrar sennig wen: "eiifet nezzeh ayen i wen Nefka, mmektit ed i illan degs, amar a peezzbem
Sinna, deffir waya, twexxoem. Lemmer macci d lfevl n Oebbi fellawen, akked ueunu S, a ppilim seg imexsuoen
Ni$ tessnem wid, segwen, iccven di Ssebt. Nenna yasen: "ilit d iddawen imaafan
Nerra p d amedya i imuddiren akked wid i ten id ineufen, u d aaggen i wid ipeezziben
Mi inna Musa i ugdud is: "Oebbi, s tidep, Iumeo awen d a ppezlum tafunast". Nnan: "day a tettihiv fella$"? Inna: "ad iyi Isseo Oebbi! Ur ppili$ seg at war tussna
Nnan: "nuj a$ ar Mass ik, ad a$ d Ibeggen anta p". Inna: "Neppa, s tidep, la Iqqao: tafunast ur wessret, ur meeeiyet, garasen. Xedmet i wen d ippumoen
Nnan: "nuj ar Mass ik, ad a$ d Ibeggen ini s". Inna: "Neppa, s tidep, la Iqqao: d tafunast tawoa$t, ini imfeooeo, ad iaaoeb w ip iwalan
Nnan: "nuj ar Mass ik, ad a$ d Ibeggen anta p. £uone$, s tidep, tistan ppemcabint. Ih, ma Ib$a Oebbi, a nepwanhu
Inna: "Neppa, s tidep, la Iqqao: d tafunast ur taatib si tyerza n tmurt, ne$ si tissit n yigran, tueeea, ur tepwacoev". Nnan as: "tura, tebbwiv d tidep". Zlan p. Qoib ur ewqimen
Mi ten$am yiwen, wa irra p id $ef wa. Oebbi Issuffe$ ed ayen teppeffrem
Nenna: "ewwtet ep s kra ines". Akka i Issidir Oebbi lmeggtin. Issenaat awen issekniyen iS, amar a pfehmem

Sinna, deffir waya, qquoen wulawen nnwen; cuban aeou, ne$ kteo, di ta$eot. Ih, llan ieoa iseg d pfeggiven isaffen. Llan, s tidep, wid ipceqqiqen, teff$en d waman segsen. S tidep, llan wid i$ellin si tugwdi n Oebbi. Ur I$fil Oebbi $ef wayen txeddmem
Day toe$bem a kwen amnen? Ni$ arbaa, segsen, ssemeasen i wawal n Oebbi, sinna, mi t fehmen, ad as bedlen udem, u nitni eoan
Mi mmugren wid iumnen, ad inin: "numen". Mi qqimen garasen, qqaoen: "day ad asen tinim ayen i wen Imla Oebbi, a kwen nna$en yis, ar Mass nnwen? Day ur tepmeyyizem ara
Ne$ ur eoin ara, Oebbi Issen ayen teffren, akked wayen qqaoen
Garasen, at war ta$uoi, ur nessin Tazmamt, siwa ayen nnwan. Nitni $ilen kan

A tawa$it n wid ipparun Tazmamt s ifassen nnsen, sinna, qqaoen: "ayagi s$uo Oebbi", iwakken ad a$en, yis, ayen oxisen! A tawa$it nnsen, ilmend n wayen uran ifassen nnsen! A tawa$it nnsen, $ef wayen keppben
Nnan: "ur a$ tepnal tmes, d awez$i, siwa kra n wussan". Ini: "day teiifem lemaahda s$uo Oebbi? Oebbi, d awez$i, ur Izeggil lemaahda S. Ne$ teqqaoem, $ef Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Xaii, win ikesben tucmip, u tennev as tuccva s…, widak, d at tmes, degs ad wekkoen
Wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, widak, d at Loennet, degs ad wekkoen

Mi Nga laaqed i At Isoail: "ur aabdet siwa Oebbi. Elhut ar imawlan, ar llzem nnwen, ar igujilen, ar igellilen. Init i medden, awal imaanen. eeEallet, zekkit". Sinna, twexxoem, siwa kra segwen, u, kunwi, tnumrem
Mi wen Nga laaqed nnwen: "ur zzazalet idim nnwen, ur pemssuffu$et seg ixxamen nnwen". D$a twefqem, kunwi d inagan

Sinna, kunwi d wid immin$en, tessuff$em arbaa segwen, seg ixxamen nnsen. Tezzim asen s ibekkaven akked taadawt. Ma usan kwen id, d imeebas, tfeddum ten. Irna, ipwagdel awen usuffe$ nnsen. Day tumnem deg ueric n Tezmamt, tnekoem wayev? Anwa ay d arraz n wid, segwen, ixedmen aya, ma macci d ddell, di tmeddurt n ddunit, u, ass n tnekra, ad ppunefken i uaaqeb uqsie mavi? Ur I$fil Oebbi $ef wayen txeddmem
Widak d wid iu$en tudert n ddunit s laxeot, ur ippifsus fellasen uaaqeb, ur ppusellken

Ni$ Nefka Tazmamt i Musa. Nuzen ed imazanen, deffir es. Nefka abeggen i Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, Null it s ooue iqedsen. Yal tikelt ideg ara kwen id ias umazan, s wayen ur awen nehwi, tesme$woem iman nnwen. Kra teskaddbem ten, kra ten$am ten
Nnan: "ulawen nne$ qquoen". Xaii, Ixza ten Oebbi, ilmend n tijehli nnsen. Drus iten wid iumnen
Mi ten id tusa Tezmamt, s$uo Oebbi, d atebbet n wayen illan $uosen, - u llan, iu$ leal, ssuturen ad $elben wid ijehlen - mi ten id iusa wayen ssnen, ugin t. Ad Inaal Oebbi ijehliyen
I icmet wayen i$ef zzenzen iman nnsen! Ugin ayen id Issers Oebbi. Eesden mi id Issers Oebbi, si lfevl iS, i win i S ihwan n yimdanen iS. Sebbeben urrif ar wayev. I ijehliyen, aaaqeb isdullun

Ma nnan asen: "amnet s wayen id Issers Oebbi"! A d inin: "numen s wayen id irsen $uone$". Nekoen ayen i t id itebaan, u neppa d tidep, d atebbet n wayen illan $uosen. Ini: "acimi tneqqem lambiyya n Oebbi, zik, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ni$ iusa kwen id Musa, s ubeggen. Sinna, deffir es, teddam akked uaajmi. Kunwi d imednas

Mi Nga laaqed yidwen, Nessuli adrar sennig wen: "eiifet nezzeh ayen i wen Nefka, u ssemeesset". Nnan d: "nesla u nauua". Ikecm asen uaajmi ar wul, si tjehli nnsen. Ini: "dir it wayen i wen iumeo liman nnwen, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ini: "maday, ar Oebbi, axxam aneggaru i kunwi kan, ur pkkan ara imdanen, mennit tameppant, ma tessawalem tidep
D awez$i, ur p pmennin, ilmend n wayen xedmen ifassen nnsen. Oebbi Issen imednas
A ten tafev, war ccekk, eemmlen tameddurt sennig medden, sennig imcurak. Atan yiwen segsen, issaram ad idder agim iseggwasen. Te$wzi n laameo is, ur as tessifrir aaaqeb. Oebbi Ipwali ayen xeddmen
Ini: "anwa illan d acengu n Jebrayen"? D neppa, s tidep, it id issersen $ef wul ik, s leb$i n Oebbi. D atebbet n wayen it id izwaren, d nnhaya u d abecceo n lmumnin
Win illan d acengu n Oebbi, lmalayek iS, imazanen iS, Jebrayen, Mikail…, ihi, Oebbi d acengu ijehliyen
Ni$ Nessers ak d issekniyen iberrzen. I ten inekoen, siwa iballa$en
Day yal tikelt ideg ara gen laaqed, a t ixdaa urbaa segsen? Ih, tegwti segsen, ur uminen
Mi ten id iusa umazan s$uo Oebbi, itebbet ayen illan $uosen, arbaa n wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, rran Tazmamt n Oebbi s azagur nnsen, amzun ur ssinen

Ddan akked wayen xedmen ccwaien mgal tagelda n Sliman. Sliman ur ijhil. Maca ccwaien jehlen. Sseefaven i medden sseur, akked wayen id irsen, di Babil, ar lmalayek Harut akked Marut. Ur sselmaden yiwen, mebla ma nnan: "nekwni n$ewwu kan, ur jehhel"! EEEEefven, $uosen, amek ara ssemfaoaqen argaz akked tmeiiut is. Ur iiurun yiwen syis, siwa ma Ib$a Oebbi. EEEEefven ara ten ivuooen, ur ten ineffaa. Ni$ eoan ar win i p iu$en, ur as illi umur di laxeot. War ccekk, ard ucmit wayen is zzenzen leowae nnsen, lemmer eoin
Lemmer, s tidep, uminen u eezzben, ad ifrir warraz s$uo Oebbi, lemmer ssinen
A wid iumnen! Ur qqaret: "Aass a$ d", init: "Wali a$ d", u ssemeesset. I ijehliyen, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ur b$in ara ijehliyen, seg wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, akked imcurak, ad awen d irs kra n lxio, s$uo Mass nnwen. Oebbi Ismenyaf, s ueunu S, win i S ihwan. Oebbi d Bab n lfevl ameqwoaean
Ur Nessemsay assekni, ne$ ur t Nesseppu, mebla ma Nebbwi d win it yifen, ne$ i t icban. Day ur teeoiv ara Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Day ur teeoiv ara, ar n Oebbi tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan? Ur tesaim, war Oebbi, bab, ne$ asettao
Ne$ teb$am a ppesteqsim Amazan nnwen, akken ippusteqsa, zik, Musa? Win ibeddlen liman s tijehli, innetlaf ar yir abrid
Si leesed nnsen, aias seg wAt Tezmamt, mi sen d tban tidep, budden awen tijehli, mbaad liman nnwen. Ssemeet, ssemsut, ar d Ias Oebbi s lameo iS. Ni$ Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
eeallet, zekkit. Ayen ara tezzewrem n lxio i iman nnwen, a t tafem ar Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipwali ayen akw txeddmem
Nnan: "ur ikeccem Loennet, siwa win illan d uday, ne$ d amasiei". D wagi ay d asirem nnsen. Ini: "awit ed atebbet nnwen, ma tessawalem tidep
Xaii, win iunzen i Oebbi, u d aaovi, ad isau arraz is, ar Mass is. Ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen

Nnan wudayen: "imasieiyen ur sennden s acemma". Nnan imasieiyen: "udayen ur sennden s acemma". U nitni la qqaoen Tazmamt. Akka, wid ur nessin ara, nnan am nitni. Ad Ieudd Oebbi, garasen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden

Anwa idensen sennig wid igedlen, di leowamaa n Oebbi, asmekti n yisem iS, u lhan d deg ussexoeb nnsen? Widak, ur iwata ara a ten kecmen, siwa ma s tugwdi. I nitni, ddell di ddunit, u aaaqeb abarar di laxeot
N Oebbi agmuv akked utaram. Ar wanda tezzim, din Udem n Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi d Ajemmal, d Amusnaw
Nnan: "Oebbi Isaa mmi S". Gedha s yiS! Ni$ ineS i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Akw, peallan i Neppa
Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan. Ma Iseyya lameo, ad as Yini kan: "ili"! Ad yili

Nnan wid ur nessin: "a lemmer ad a$ d Immeslay Oebbi, ne$ ad a$ d ias ussekni"! Akka ay nnan wid i ten id izwaren, am awalen nnsen. Ppemcabin wulawen nnsen. Ni$ Nbeggen ed issekniyen i ugdud ipputebbten
Ih, Nuzen ik id, s tidep, d abcir, u d aneddao. Ur ippili fellak usteqsi $ef at wu$ud

Ur k poavin wudayen ne$ imasieiyen, alamma teddiv d ddin nnsen. Ini: "d nehhu n Oebbi ay d nehhu". Ma teddiv akked usirem nnsen, deffir wayen ik ed iusan n tmusni, ur k ipfukku, si Oebbi, bab, ne$ asettao
Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, qqaoen p leqoaya iwatan. Widak umnen yis. Wid i p iugin, widak d imexsuoen
A yAt Isoail! Mmektit ed l$it iW, is i kwen £ate$. Nek, Smenyafe$ kwen i imavalen
Eezzbet i wass ideg ur ippuqeiii yiwen, deg umkan n wayev, s wacemma; ur tepwaqbal le$oama segs, ur t tenfaa ccafuaa, ur ppusellken
Iboahim, mi t Ijeooeb Mass is, s wawalen, iu$ awal. Inna: "Nek, a k Rre$ d win ara inehhun medden". Inna: "u si tarwa w"? Inna: "lemaahda W ur taana ara imednas
Mi Nerra Axxam d lemqam i yimdanen, u d amkan n laman: "erret lemqam n Iboahim d loamaa"! Nauhed i Iboahim akked Ismaail: "zzizdget Axxam iW, i wid idewwioen, wid ip$imin, wid iiiinizen, wid ikennun

Mi inna Iboahim: "a Mass iw! Err wagi d tamdint n laman, £it imezda$ is s ppemoat; wid, segsen, iumnen s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru". Inna: "win ijehlen, a t Ooe$ ad izhu cwii, sinna, a t Nehoe$ ar uaaqeb n tmes. A tu$alin tucmip
Iboahim akked Ismaail, mi ssalayen leeyuv n Uxxam: "a Mass nne$! Eqbel s$uone$, Kecc, s tidep, d Win Isellen, d Amusnaw
A Mass nne$! Err ane$ d imvuaen iK, u, si dderya nne$, lois ar aK ianzen. Mel a$ isekkiren nne$, Ssuref a$. Kecc, s tidep, Tessurufev, Tepeunuv
A Mass nne$! Azen asen d amazan segsen, ad asen iqqao issekniyen iK, ad asen isseefev Tazmamt akked uuwab, a ten izzizdeg. Kecc, s tidep, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Anwa iugin ddin n Iboahim, siwa win iccemten iman is? Ni$ Nefren it di ddunit. Di laxeot, neppa, war ccekk, seg iaaoviyen
Mi s Inna Mass is: "anez"! Inna: "unze$ aS i Mass imavalen
Iweuua yis Iboahim arraw is - akken Iaaqub -: "a yarraw iw, Oebbi, s tidep, Ifren awen ddin, ur ppemmtet siwa ma tunzem
Ne$ tellam d inagan mi d ters tmeppant ar Yaaqub, mi inna i tarwa s: "anwa ara taabdem deffir i"? Nnan: "a naabed Oebbi k, u Oebbi n lejdud ik: Iboahim, Ismaail, Iseaq. Oebbi Yiwen. Nekwni nunez aS
Wigi d lois i iaaddan. Ines ayen ikseb, nnwen ayen tkesbem. Ur kwen steqsayen $ef wayen xeddmen
Nnan: "ilit d udayen ne$ d imasieiyen, a ppepwanhum". Ini: "Xaii, maca ddin n Iboahim, imalen ar tidep. Ur illi seg imcurak

Init: "numen s Oebbi akked wayen id irsen $uone$, wayen id irsen ar Iboahim, Ismaail, Iseaq, Iaaqub, laaoac, ayen ippunefken i Musa, Aisa, ayen ippunefken i lambiyya, s$uo Mass nnsen. Ur nessemgarrad yiwen segsen, nekwni nunez aS
Ma umnen ayen icuban ayen tumnem, atnan pwanhan. Ma wexxoen, haaten kan di lefoaq. Iqadd ik Oebbi, segsen. Neppa Issel, d Amusnaw
Ssbi$a, n Oebbi. Anwa yifen Oebbi i ssbi$a? Nekwni d iaabbaden iS
Ini: "day ad a$ tnamrem $ef Oebbi, u Neppa d Mass nne$, u d Mass nnwen? I nekwni igiten nne$, i kunwi igiten nnwen. Nekwni d izedganen iS

Ne$ a d tinim: "s tidep, Iboahim, Ismaail, Iseaq, Iaaqub, laaoac, llan d udayen, ne$ d imasieiyen"? Ini: "Anwa i isnen sennig akw, d kunwi ne$ d Oebbi"? Anwa i idensen sennig win iffren ccada, i isaa s$uo Oebbi? Ur I$fil Oebbi $ef wayen txeddmem
Asatu agi iaadda. Ines ayen ikseb, nnwen ayen tkesbem. Ur fellawen asteqsi $ef wayen xeddmen
